HTMLSlotElementAssign.summary: The assign() method of the interface sets the slot's manually assigned nodes to an ordered set of slottables. The manually assigned nodes set is initially empty until nodes are assigned using assign().

blockquote.para: Note: you cannot mix manually (imperative) and named (declarative, automatic) slot assignments. Therefore, for this method to work, the shadow tree needs to have been created with the slotAssignment: "manual" option.
